Reviews.Title: Like the functionality, but still waiting for a smaller version
Reviews.Author: Bethany Kovars "-beth"
Reviews.Content: I bought the phone at my local store (Santiago) for about US$260, which is actually pretty cheap for any sort of smart phone here (most phones run like 2-4x the price of in US)It ended up like the story of the three little bears.I was looking at the L3, L5, and L7.L7 was wayyyy too big, but it had tempting specs.I liked the L3, but it seemed like specs from 2-3 years ago.I picked up the L5 and it was juuuuuuust right. Or was it?Hrmm... while I don't use the phone in all too serious of a manner (light internet use, simple games, watching videos, etc. etc.) I find the specs just right for me. No complaints.However, I find it too big. It just doesn't fit into most of my (female) pockets. I had the LG Optimus P970 (I think) for a couple years and that fit well in my pocket. The L5 is noticably thinner, but it's also longer and wider.I do wish I had a L3 sized phone with L5 specs. That would've been perfect for me.Anyways, some of my favorite things about the phone include that you can choose what tools you put in the drop down menu. I toggle wifi and 3g connections all day long, so those are obviously there. I don't use blutooth, so I took that off. The dimmer is wonderful, but I wish it had more than 3 settings. GPS can also be put up there (never use it). There's also a screen rotation lock, but it only lets me lock vertical, not landscape. I wish that there was an alarm quicklink here because sometimes I want to access it when surfing the web or whatnot.They seem to have gotten rid of the LGsocial app which I absolutely loved on my old phone. :( The regular apps just aren't as good for Facebook and Twitter.The batter seems to last a long time with Wifi always on (about 2 days) but dies pretty quick (1 day) when 3g is turned on.Anyways, I've had it for about 2 months now, and I like it. I just wish it was smaller. If I had to do it all over again, I would still buy it. I can't imagine a better phone out there for the price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Item
Reviews.Author: NyamebaEric
Reviews.Content: I am really am happy with product. excellent battery life and lightweight. Ultra fast delivery and works to my expectation. Its a budget phone that perform excellently well. I recommed to all because it works to perfection

Reviews.Title: Very very good according with its price
Reviews.Author: Tony M
Reviews.Content: As good according with its price. Works fine according as expected. Bluetoth, wifi and 3G are fine.Not as fast as iPhone nor Samsung II or III but less than half its price.

Reviews.Title: Fair for the price.
Reviews.Author: joentisu
Reviews.Content: LG Optimus L5 is a mid range smartphone so don't fool yourself comparing it to a Samsung S3, HTC One o Sony Xperia Z.With this in mind, you will have (and enjoy) in your hands a nice piece of equipment with a decent screen and reasonable response speed.PROS: mfg. date Jan.2013, ellegant design, ICS, QuickMemo, firmware got automatically upgraded via WiFi as soon as it was turned on, good call quality (tested with Claro Ecuador, Movilnet and Movistar Venezuela),CONS: model received was E612 which came with several chinese apps (Hami) impossible to be deleted without rooting (I have just hidden them, so they are still wasting some memory). BTW, operation language was also set to chinese, but it only took four steps (about 15 seconds) to change it to spanish (or any language you may want. Due to the model (WCDMA 900 / 2100), no 3G connection over the networks above mentioned.

Reviews.Title: normal phone
Reviews.Author: Checho Rivera P
Reviews.Content: Lg offers low price phones that are good enough.  its no the best nor the worst.  Dont expect an iPhone or galaxy s3/4 experience.

Reviews.Title: LG Optimus L5 E610
Reviews.Author: Andrés Simoza
Reviews.Content: to be a midrange cell interface is incredibly fast, the camera is great, moves pretty well for internet and keyboard Lg genre for this range of phones is incredibly comfortable, the cell size is optimal to write in my opinion is an excellent team, the only bad thing is that as a good android phone has a very cort batery life does not last over a day and a half

Reviews.Title: Not for the U.S. market, but sold to U.S. customers
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Bush
Reviews.Content: The phone is a nice concept, but it is NOT designed for the U.S. market.  We had several problems, and LG's technical support in the U.S. refused to provide any help.  No manual was included with the phone (had to search for one on-line and download it), and the charger was a European-style plug, not suitable for the U.S.  Without support for the problems, the phone became worthless.  At least Amazon agreed to a refund.  The seller should be penalized by Amazon for trying to sell a European product in the U.S., where support is unavailable.

Reviews.Title: Got what I expected a very nice low budget phone
Reviews.Author: Belle
Reviews.Content: The phone was delivered on time and in mint condition. It came in the manufacturer packaging with an European charger with US adapter, headphones, and user manual . I popped my T-mobile SIM card in and followed the start up instructions and I was ready to go. The phone is just the right size, not too small so the playing videos and browsing the web is okay but it's not too large for my small hands.The cons:The screen quality is not great at all. Pixels are HUGE in comparison to other smartphones other there. One of the worst in my opinion but then again it is a low-mid range phone. It is NOWHERE near the iPhone, Nokia Lumia 920 or Samsung Note 2 counterparts.The version OS installed was the glitchy version of the ice cream sandwich so the phone acted lagged straight out the box but that was easily fix by updated the android software. Once I did that the phone was a breeze. No gyroscope so the motion and direction sensing is not as crisp as phones with one embedded. Don't be deterred though because that tech is usually found in the more pricey phones. So If you want that, you need to cough up more money.The camera... sigh... the screen is so bad that the pics look like they were taken with a VGA camera. but basically its the same camera that is found on the iPhone 4. If the screen was better the pics would look better.Its a single core processor so its freezes up and moves glitchy if you are running multiple apps.The ProsAfter the software upgrade the phone was snappy with no apparent glitching.The touchscreen is super sensitive. I was not expecting that at all. It have quick memo and even writing with my fingers it was pretty good and recognizing the characters. I need to get a stylus to really check it out but so far so good.The size was prefect for me. 4 inch screen was just what I wanted.The phone performed its phone functions well i.e. calling  (The call screens however sometimes go black so when you are trying to hang up a call you basically have to do a battery pull), texting, the works....Conclusion:The screen quality was the only reason it lost a stars but I got what I expected for the most part. A okay budget phone. with a few tweaks here and there it turns into a fine machine. But don't expect anything major as it is filled with flaws. I wouldn't suggest it for anyone's permanent phone.  It's a decent option for a pre-teen or as temp-phone.

Reviews.Title: Worked in Argentina
Reviews.Author: Ariel
Reviews.Content: I bought this unlocked cellphone and it was unlocked :) I just inserted a GSM sim from Movistar and it worked right away.The cellphone itself isn't the best. It's pretty slow compared to latest devices, and the screen resolution is very poor. Also videos are recorded in VGA quality.Overall, if you need a cheap unlocked mobile device, go for it.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Johanna T. "Johanna T."
Reviews.Content: Great product. The box came with all the accesories and manuals. The phone also is pretty good and responsive considerating the price and was launch 1 year and half (June 2012). Has dual sim option which is good and you can be relax because is not a chinese version, is original from LG. I recommeded to someone that want to begin using smartphones and is not interest in rapidity and high specs.

Reviews.Title: the phone charger does not work.
Reviews.Author: jameson vah
Reviews.Content: the charger has problem,the phone charger does not work.i have to find me a new phone charger before my phone work.

Reviews.Title: Solid, easy to use phone
Reviews.Author: KJBB "Global Mom"
Reviews.Content: This phone is a great introduction to smart phones. It is easy to use and quick to personalize. I gave it four stars because the battery drains pretty quickly when the Wi-fi is on and the charging plug for the wall that came with it doesn't work. I can charge it with the USB cable on my computer but I had to buy a different charger for the wall. Otherwise the phone design is a good one and I'd recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Rocky start
Reviews.Author: Mary M. Miller
Reviews.Content: When I got the phone, the instruction booklet was in Chinese and many of the icons for apps were as well.  Hassle free did email me the English version though I would prefer to have a hard copy, and guided me through getting rid of Chinese icons and other set up problems.

Reviews.Title: The cellphone arrived perfectly
Reviews.Author: Egnis Abi Samra
Reviews.Content: I recommend it. It's a nice simple phone that I bought and I gave it to my daughter who needed one, and she likes it.

Reviews.Title: Not the Best!
Reviews.Author: Adella Holt
Reviews.Content: The 1st thing about this phone that was disheartening was the fact that it did not come with a manual.  The only info. that came with it was in Japanese.  I could not find a manual on line.  Consequently, I really don't know how to operate many facets on the phone.  It is pretty slow in operation and calls drop at certain times of the evening.  It provides the bare bones minimium service.  I would reccommend this phone to someone who does not need it to perfom a lot of duties.

Reviews.Title: buen producto
Reviews.Author: edeciogr
Reviews.Content: El producto llego excelentes condiciones y se entrego en la fecha indicada estoy muy agradecido por la atencion; el producto funciona perfectamente

Reviews.Title: its good
Reviews.Author: That Guy "dragonclan"
Reviews.Content: dint come with a cd or English manual, but that's ok i guess that's what hi speed internet is for

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: raul perez
Reviews.Content: The packaging is excellent perfect thank you very muchrecommended the product is of very good quality, is all that I expected of it, is a product that I recommend to all the amazon community.I recommend it very appropriate material is expected in this type of producthigh-tech phone very current and recommended

Reviews.Title: Just what I've looking for
Reviews.Author: Daniel Rojas
Reviews.Content: Just what I've looking for, it is a smart phone that have all what I need in a cell phone

Reviews.Title: Great phone and service
Reviews.Author: A Customer
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with my Optimus L5. It's just the way I thought it would be. It didn't dissapoint me.And the seller gave me just what they said they were selling: A new unlocked LG Optimus L5. Nothing more and, and nothing less. The cellphone's package was unopened and had all its documentation, including the manufacter's warranty.The cellphone was unblocked. I inserted my old SIM card, and it was immediatly recognized.The only problem I had with this phone, is that it had all its menu were by default in Chinese. I was scared at first, but when I calmed down, I started navigating each menu, until I found languaged and then changed to English.

Reviews.Title: LG-E610
Reviews.Author: islndr
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a phone that give me all the features of my iphone but without paying a monthly subscription just to have a smart phone ,The LG-E610 has everything you need and the FM stereo radio is a big plus ,you  pay for what you download without a monthly subscription ,I needed to find a good phone when my carrier stop letting me send text messages with my iphone even though i was paying for unlimited text because i refuse to pay just to have a smart phone.The LG-E610 is a great looking fantastic phone i am very happy with it and very user friendly for all your downloading needs,I plan to oder a second LG-610 from amazon to keep in reserve just incase i loose the one i have,Thanks LG you did good.

Reviews.Title: I want my money back
Reviews.Author: Beatriz Pinto Tovar
Reviews.Content: i bought two cell phones and they sent me two balls and a few pens. I want my money back

Reviews.Title: Easy to use - but slows over time
Reviews.Author: T.
Reviews.Content: This is my first smartphone. I've had dumb phones with AT&T; for years. I wanted to be able to use Wi-Fi in areas that didn't have an AT&T; tower, like my mother's house. So I use Google Voice when I can't use AT&T.;When I got the phone I inserted my sim card and could use it right away. The call quality is great. I like being able to close apps that are not being used to the power lasts longer. It takes great pictures. Sound quality, when playing music or for me, podcasts, is not great, speakers are recommended.I've dropped it twice on concrete and it is still like new.Update:I have had the phone for almost a year. The phone is slow to respond to touch and to answer calls. I am a patient person so I will wait a good 10 seconds for the phone to respond.On occasion, when I attempt to reply to a text message, the letters will not show on the screen, even after waiting for the letters to show.The phone has begun to either restart or shutdown on its own.I only use Wi-fi, but even if I have the Wi-fi off, the phone is still slow.Google Voice will only work if I have some sort of AT&T; service, so consequently, I don't use Google Voice.I still drop it and the face still hasn't cracked, so that is a plus.I like it, but don't have another personal smart phone to compare it to.

Reviews.Title: Defective product - chinese programming and no follow-up
Reviews.Author: Jathel's mommy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone and when it arrived discovered that it had a chinese programming... imagine trying to do the setup... pretty much clicked on every simbol/word until something would happen like it was going to be setup for language. Then found out that the screen is also defective... does not react to touch, I had to enter the password like 20 times for it to recognze the movement... it freezes every time I access an app... phone feature freezes... on your end... on the receiver's end they can asnwer and get only the blank sound of someone leaving you alone in the conversation and then when you manage to unlock the password again, the call is still going on... not good for your minutes :-( and finally when I contacted them, they would simply say that could not have it reprogrammed or repaired cause it would void the warranty... then when I asked if I could ship back but they would have to make an excepcion since I am sending it back from overseas I got no response back at all... simply did not respond anymore. 1 star is still too much in my books, not only I lost the money, I don't have a phone and can not even sell it. Stay away from this vendor.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: J. Cañez "Ubit"
Reviews.Content: I'ts a very Good Phone.Battery Do not last much.Android 4 OS it's fast but some apps Like Skype slow down this phone to death.Nice Camera, better than iphone in my opinion.i recommend this product, it's fine!

Reviews.Title: Slow
Reviews.Author: David W. Nugent
Reviews.Content: It is an OK phone. Definitely inferior to other Android phones on the market. It is extremely slow to respond and needs re-booting at least every other week. Inferior connectivity also.

Reviews.Title: poor phone all around
Reviews.Author: david heinrich
Reviews.Content: The phone freezes up alot even with all the apps not running.  Seems like a knock off phone but its not, if ya know what i mean.

Reviews.Title: mi compra todavi no me ha llegado
Reviews.Author: MARIA EUGENIA DEL CARMEN PACIFICO LOPEZ
Reviews.Content: queria saber que ha pasado con mi compra de este telefono que todavia no me ha llegado. no puedo deir mas
